reporter-output.line: Test Case : To verify User can Add Electronics device to Cart.</br>
Step-1 : Open Flipkart URL : https://www.flipkart.com/</br>
Verify Flipkart site has been opened successfully</br>
Flipkart Homepage opened sucessfully.--
Step-2 : Close the Login Pop up.</br>
Step-3 : Select Electronics menu > Mobile > Realme device.</br>
Realme selected from Electronics menu > Mobile category</br>
Verify Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting device Realme</br>
Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting device Realme--
Step-4 : Apply minimum and maximum Price range.</br>
Minimum value set to: 10000 and Maximum value set to 30000</br>
Verify Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting Price range 10000 to 30000</br>
Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting Price range 10000 to 30000--
Step-5 : Apply RAM filter.</br>
Applied RAM filter for 4 GB and 6 GB & Above</br>
Verify Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting RAM 4 GB and 6 GB & Above</br>
Search result page shows correct Filtered result after selecting RAM 4 GB and 6 GB & Above--
Step-6 : Apply CUSTOMER RATINGS filter.</br>
Customer rating set for 4 and above stars.</br>
Verify Search result page shows correct Filtered result after Customer Ratings applied 4 and above stars.</br>
Search result page shows correct Filtered result after Customer Ratings applied 4 and above stars.--
Step-7 : Sort the search result by Price -- High to Low.</br>
Clicked on the Price High to Low sorting tab.</br>
Verify Search result page shows correct Filtered result after Price High to Low sorted</br>
Search result page shows correct Filtered result after Price High to Low sorted--
Step-8 : Click the Title of Largest Price device.</br>
Clicked on the largest price Mobile details.</br>
Verify Successfully clicked on the highest price device.</br>
Successfully clicked on the highest price device.--
Step-9 : Click the 'Add to Cart' button.</br>
Clicked on the Add to Cart button.</br>
Verify Device successfully added to cart.</br>
Device successfully added to cart.--

test.name: To verify Flipkart scenario add to cart.

param.value: [TestResult name=searchMobileFilter status=SUCCESS method=IndexSc1.searchMobileFilter()[pri:0, instance:com.flipkart.Scenario1.IndexSc1@7a1ebcd8] output=Test Case : To verify User can Add Electronics device to Cart.</br>]

Step-7 : Sort the search result by Price -- High to Low.</br>
